Articles.Content: I want to make a door on a space station to make a docking bay utilizing the wing connectors as most of the parts. I tried to use lander legs as hinges, but unlike .15, I can\'t seem to connect the wing connectors to the legs. Any suggestions? No mods, I want stock parts.
Well its stock so its impossible for now, so Damned Robotics would be needed.
So basically I can\'t attack anything to lander legs? I cant use the legs as grapples, and you can attach struts to them, I dont understand why I cant attach anything else.
i want to attach an EVA'ing kerbal to a controlable arm.

You can use the landing legs as doors, as you cant walk through them with a kerbal. Im prett sure you can't attach anything to a leg, and as with attaching things to the control canards, they won't move even if the canard does, so your pieces would stay in the same place even if you did somehow attach them to the legs and moved them.
